headline: Tiffany Moves 114,000 Pieces 50 Feet Under Watchful Eyes
abstract: It took dozens of security officers, hundreds of cameras and a vow of secrecy for the storied jeweler to move to temporary quarters as it renovates its flagship store on Fifth Avenue.
lead_paragraph: Tiffany & Company had millions of dollars’ worth of shining, sparkling jewelry in its famous Fifth Avenue store on Sunday: $4,000 rings that spell the word “love” in small diamonds, $165,000 diamond necklaces, and even a $2.475 million engagement ring that weighs as much as a bullet.
keywords: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
